00013 // Passive/Active open constructor
00014 TCPState::TCPState(unsigned int initialSequenceNum, unsigned int state, unsigned int timertries)
00015 {
00016   stateOfcnx = state;
00017   tmrTries = timertries;
00018   TCP_BUFFER_SIZE = 100*TCP_MAXIMUM_SEGMENT_SIZE; //100 packets in buffer
00019   N = 16*TCP_MAXIMUM_SEGMENT_SIZE; //16 packets allowed in flight
00020 
00021   // Send side initialization
00022   last_acked = initialSequenceNum;
00023   last_sent  = last_acked;
00024   rwnd       = 0;
00025 
00026   // Receiver side initialization
00027   last_recvd = 0;
00028 }

00032 {
00033 }

00035 bool TCPState::ExpireTimerTries()
00036 {
00037   if (tmrTries == 0) {
00038     return true;
00039   } else {
00040     tmrTries--;
00041     return false;
00042   }
00043 }
00044 
00045 bool TCPState::SetLastAcked(unsigned int newack)
00046 {
00047   if(last_acked <= last_sent) {
00048     if(newack > last_acked && newack <= last_sent + 1) {
00049       //Delete the front of the buffer
00050       SendBuffer.Erase(0, newack - last_acked);
00051       last_acked = newack - 1;
00052       return true;
00053     } else {
00054       return false;
00055     }
00056   } else if(newack > last_acked && newack > last_sent) {
00057     //Delete the front of the buffer
00058     SendBuffer.Erase(0, newack - last_acked);
00059     last_acked = newack - 1;
00060     return true;
00061   } else if(newack < last_acked && newack <= last_sent + 1) {
00062     //Delete the front of the buffer
00063     SendBuffer.Erase(0, (SEQ_LENGTH_MASK - last_acked + 1) + newack);
00064     last_acked = newack - 1;
00065     return true;
00066   } else
00067     return false;
00068 }
00069 
00070 unsigned int TCPState::GetRwnd()
00071 {
00072   return TCP_BUFFER_SIZE - RecvBuffer.GetSize();
00073 }
00074 void TCPState::SetLastRecvd(unsigned int lastrecvd)
00075 {
00076   last_recvd = lastrecvd;
00077 }
00078 
00079 bool TCPState::SetLastRecvd(unsigned int lastrecvd, unsigned int length)
00080 {
00081   if(lastrecvd == last_recvd + 1) {
00082     if((length <= N) && (RecvBuffer.GetSize()+length <= TCP_BUFFER_SIZE)) {
00083       last_recvd += length;
00084       return true;
00085     } else {
00086       return false;
00087     }
00088   }
00089   else {
00090     return false;
00091   }
00092 }
00093 
00094 void TCPState::SendPacketPayload(unsigned &offsetlastsent, size_t &bytesize, unsigned bytes)
00095 {
00096   if(last_acked < last_sent) {
00097     offsetlastsent = last_sent - last_acked;
00098   } else {
00099     offsetlastsent = SEQ_LENGTH_MASK - last_acked + last_sent + 1;
00100   }
00101 
00102   bytesize = MIN_MACRO((rwnd - offsetlastsent), (N - offsetlastsent));
00103   bytesize = MIN_MACRO(bytesize, bytes);
00104   bytesize = MIN_MACRO(bytesize, TCP_MAXIMUM_SEGMENT_SIZE);
00105 }
